languages.text: Any effects, applied by the Navigator and activated at the start or at the end of the target's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, are inflicted one additional time at the end of every one of the Navigator's turn.
languages.original_text: Любые наложенные навигатором эффекты, которые активируются в начале или в конце {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} цели, активируются еще раз дополнительно в конце каждого хода навигатора.

traits.locale_text: Any effects, applied by the Navigator and actuated at the start or at the end of the target's turn, are inflicted one additional time at the end of every Navigator's turn.
Any effects, applied by the Navigator and activated at the start or at the end of the target's turn, are inflicted one additional time at the end of every one of the Navigator's turn.

Any effects, applied by the Navigator and activated at the start or at the end of the target's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, are inflicted one additional time at the end of every one of the Navigator's turn.

Any effects, applied by the Navigator and activated at the start or at the end of the target's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, are inflicted one additional time at the end of every one of the Navigator's turn.

languages.text: Любые наложенные навигатором эффекты, которые активируются в начале или в конце {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} цели, активируются еще раз дополнительно в конце каждого хода навигатора.
languages.original_text: Any effects, applied by the Navigator and activated at the start or at the end of the target's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, are inflicted one additional time at the end of every one of the Navigator's turn.

traits.locale_text: Любые наложенные навигатором эффекты, которые активируются в начале или в конце {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} цели, активируются еще раз дополнительно в конце каждого хода навигатора.
Любые наложенные навигатором эффекты, которые активируются в начале или в конце {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} цели, активируются еще раз дополнительно в конце каждого хода навигатора.

languages.text: 所有由导航者施加，会在目标{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始或结束时发挥作用的效果，都会在导航者每个回合结束时额外施加一次。
languages.original_text: Any effects, applied by the Navigator and activated at the start or at the end of the target's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, are inflicted one additional time at the end of every one of the Navigator's turn.

traits.locale_text: 所有由导航者施加，会在目标{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始或结束时发挥作用的效果，都会在导航者每个回合结束时额外施加一次。

languages.text: Todo efecto aplicado por el navegante que se active al comienzo o al final del {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del objetivo se inflige una vez adicional al final de cada uno de los turnos del navegante.
languages.original_text: Any effects, applied by the Navigator and activated at the start or at the end of the target's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, are inflicted one additional time at the end of every one of the Navigator's turn.

traits.locale_text: Todo efecto aplicado por el navegante que se active al comienzo o al final del {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del objetivo se inflige una vez adicional al final de cada uno de los turnos del navegante.

languages.text: Alle vom Navigator angewendeten Effekte, die zu Beginn oder am Ende des {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g} des Ziels aktiviert wurden, werden am Ende jedes Zugs des Navigators ein weiteres Mal zugefügt.
languages.original_text: Any effects, applied by the Navigator and activated at the start or at the end of the target's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, are inflicted one additional time at the end of every one of the Navigator's turn.

traits.locale_text: Alle vom Navigator angewendeten Effekte, die zu Beginn oder am Ende der {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Runde{/g} des Ziels aktiviert wurden, werden am Ende jeder Runde des Navigators ein weiteres Mal zugefügt.

languages.text: Les effets, appliqués par le navigateur et activés au début ou à la fin du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} de la cible, sont de nouveau infligés à la fin de chaque tour du navigateur.
languages.original_text: Any effects, applied by the Navigator and activated at the start or at the end of the target's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, are inflicted one additional time at the end of every one of the Navigator's turn.

traits.locale_text: Les effets, appliqués par le Navigateur et activés au début ou à la fin du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} de la cible, sont de nouveau infligés à la fin de chaque tour du Navigateur.

languages.text: 航宙士に付与され、ターゲットの{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始時または終了時に発動するあらゆる効果は、航宙士のターン終了時にも追加で1回発動する。
languages.original_text: Any effects, applied by the Navigator and activated at the start or at the end of the target's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, are inflicted one additional time at the end of every one of the Navigator's turn.

traits.locale_text: 航宙士に付与され、ターゲットの{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始時または終了時に発動するあらゆる効果は、航宙士のターン終了時にも追加で1回発動する。

languages.text: Rotacı'nın uyguladığı ve hedefin {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turunun{/g} başında veya sonunda etkinleşen her türlü etki, Rotacı'nın her bir turunun sonunda ilave bir zamana sebep olur.
languages.original_text: Any effects, applied by the Navigator and activated at the start or at the end of the target's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, are inflicted one additional time at the end of every one of the Navigator's turn.
